title: Culture, respect and law
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
abstract: A Yorta Yorta elder tells of mission life in Echuca.
description: Collin Walker Snr, a Yorta Yorta elder, tells of mission life and living in Echuca. This story was produced in one of ACMI's regional workshops conducted in partnership with the Njernda Aboriginal Corporation and funded by VicHealth.
